content.rendered:
Oculoplasty Services

The Following Oculoplasty Procedures are available at Aaradhya Netralaya

For Eyelids:-
· Ptosis correction
· Entropion correction
· Ectropion correction
· Lid retraction
· Lid reconstruction
· Epiblepharon correction
· Trichiasis management (including electro epilation, lash follicle excision)

For Lacrimal Gland (Tear Gland):
· External DCR (with silicon intubation)
· Canalicular repair
· Syringing and probing
· Balloon dacryoplasty
· Punctal occlusion for dry eye

For Eye Socket:-
· Encleartion with implants
· Evisceration with implants
· Exenteraton
· Dermis fat graft
· Socket rehabilitation
· Contracted socket repair
· Anophtslmic socket rehabilitation customized prosthesis

For Orbit:
· Orbitotomy
· Orbital decompression for thyroid eye disease
· Orbital fracture repair

Cosmetic Surgeries:
· Botox
· Fillers
· Upper and Lower lid blepharoplasty
· Brow lifts
· Epicanthus correction

Special Services:
· Buccalmuscous membrane graft for steven Johnson syndrome
· Facial palsy rehabilitation includes,medial and lateral cathoplasty gold weights implantation and brow lifts.
